channel.title: CVE Feed for Rancher -- Rancher
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rancher -- Rancher

item.title: CVE-2021-31999|2024-09-17T02:26:40.038Z -- rancher -- rancher
item.description: A Reliance on Untrusted Inputs in a Security Decision vulnerability in Rancher allows users in the cluster to act as others users in the cluster by forging the "Impersonate-User" or "Impersonate-Group" headers. This issue affects: Rancher versions prior to 2.5.9. Rancher versions prior to 2.4.16.
